api.interceptors.request.use(config=>{const token=localStorage.getItem('token');if(token){config.headers.Authorization="Bearer ".concat(token);}return config;},error=>{return Promise.reject(error);});// Response interceptor for error handling

export const authAPI={login:credentials=>api.post('/auth/login',credentials),register:userData=>api.post('/auth/register',userData),logout:()=>api.post('/auth/logout'),getProfile:()=>api.get('/auth/me'),updateProfile:profileData=>api.put('/auth/profile',profileData),changePassword:passwordData=>api.put('/auth/change-password',passwordData),verifyToken:()=>api.get('/auth/verify')};// Movies API
export const moviesAPI={getMovies:params=>api.get('/movies',{params}),getFeatured:()=>api.get('/movies/featured'),getSuggestions:params=>api.get('/movies/suggestions',{params}),getMovie:id=>api.get("/movies/".concat(id)),searchMovies:(query,filters)=>api.get('/movies',{params:_objectSpread({search:query},filters)}),getGenres:()=>api.get('/movies/data/genres'),// Admin endpoints
addMovie:movieData=>api.post('/movies',movieData),updateMovie:(id,movieData)=>api.put("/movies/".concat(id),movieData),deleteMovie:id=>api.delete("/movies/".concat(id))};// Reviews API
export const reviewsAPI={getMovieReviews:(movieId,params)=>api.get("/reviews/movie/".concat(movieId),{params}),submitReview:(movieId,reviewData)=>api.post("/reviews/movie/".concat(movieId),reviewData),updateReview:(reviewId,reviewData)=>api.put("/reviews/".concat(reviewId),reviewData),deleteReview:reviewId=>api.delete("/reviews/".concat(reviewId)),markHelpful:reviewId=>api.post("/reviews/".concat(reviewId,"/helpful")),markNotHelpful:reviewId=>api.post("/reviews/".concat(reviewId,"/not-helpful")),flagReview:(reviewId,reason)=>api.post("/reviews/".concat(reviewId,"/flag"),{reason}),getReviewStats:()=>api.get('/reviews/stats')};// Users API
export const usersAPI={getUser:userId=>api.get("/users/".concat(userId)),updateUser:(userId,userData)=>api.put("/users/".concat(userId),userData),deleteUser:userId=>api.delete("/users/".concat(userId)),getUserReviews:(userId,params)=>api.get("/users/".concat(userId,"/reviews"),{params}),getUserStats:userId=>api.get("/users/".concat(userId,"/stats")),followUser:userId=>api.post("/users/".concat(userId,"/follow")),unfollowUser:userId=>api.delete("/users/".concat(userId,"/follow"))};// Watchlist API
export const watchlistAPI={getWatchlist:userId=>api.get("/watchlist/".concat(userId)),addToWatchlist:(userId,movieId)=>api.post("/watchlist/".concat(userId),{movieId}),removeFromWatchlist:(userId,movieId)=>api.delete("/watchlist/".concat(userId,"/").concat(movieId)),clearWatchlist:userId=>api.delete("/watchlist/".concat(userId))};// Export the api instance for components that need direct access
